title: skins yea or nea
body: seen some good concept skins for some champions thought to share them with people like a bunch for the new yordle Gnar and some other like a scyther skin for ka'zix, a void zac, mountain climber nautilus, or tron orianna

replies.body: These are cute :) I really love Gnargoyle! Him and Galio would be best friends (KateyKhaos said that when she saw this concept!)

I definitely agree. It's well drawn and appropriately themed. :)

For anyone who's interested, please check out my Energy-based ADC/Ranged AD Caster champion concept:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/BxIn84WU-champion-concept-valruk-the-jungles-revenge
Cool skin ideas, but Gnar is new-off-champion and i think otehr champions deserve skins too :> all thought i love them ^_^
SCREW THAT GNAR IS THE CUTEST CHAMPION IN THE LEAGUE, HE DESERVES ALL SKIN PRIORITIES. RIOT PLEASE REDIRECT ALL FUNDS TO THE GNEW GNAR ASSETS CREW! GNOW!
{{champion:96}} is gonna go cry in a corner, now. And eat a gallon of ice cream. Or 50.
I don't understand the one with the pizza, what is his mega form supposed to be?
I really like the 'Gnargoyle' It's a funny play on words :) and the skin's not bad, I'd play it :3
The first two skins would be perfect *-*  {{champion:150}}

I don't get the pizza one. He turns into what? A giant grey beast with its fur burned off in spots with... green...  lights.... on its head? 
The chef mini-gnar is cute, but the mega makes no sense...

The gargoyle one is nice though.

Personally, I think gentleman Gar would be awesome.
Its a grease fire. That's why he's mad.
